$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme.text:
!! My Story A story list on steroids. Adds bookmarking and alternative labels for story-elements in sidebar tabs: * The [[MyMarks|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab]] tab shows links to bookmarked elements. * The [[MyStory|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab]] tab can replace the //Open// tab: The listing shows the title of a tiddler, if there is no caption field, the caption, if there is no other field as defined below. â€“ `title` might be a good fallback :) !!! [[Usage settings|$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]] Control active sidebar tabs:
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> <$text text={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab!!caption}}/>   <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> <$text text={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/tab!!caption}}/>   <$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open!!caption}}
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent!!caption}}   <$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Tools" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Tools!!caption}}   <$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/More" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> {{$:/core/ui/SideBar/More!!caption}} Show small buttons for every list entry:
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" index="show-edit-button" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> edit button
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" index="show-clone-button" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> clone button {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/DefaultSidebarTab}} Click the tag and arrange tabs via drag and drop:
<> !! In-Story Controls Elements tagged <> can be added below every element (tiddler) in the story.
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" index="in-story-controls" checked="show" unchecked="hide"> show in-story controls
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme

$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/readme.caption: MyStory Readme

$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab.text: \whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define editmode-icon() {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} \end \define my-close-btn() <$list filter="[all[current]!has[draft.of]]" variable="title" emptyMessage=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" $index="last-closed" $subfilter="+[[]] []"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>×</$button></$list> \end \define openMyTiddlers(filter) <$list filter=<<__filter__>> > <$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/> </$list> \end \define reopenBtn() <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}minlength[1]]"> <$set name="tt" value="reopen last closed element(s)"> <$button tooltip=<<tt>> class="tc-btn-invisible my-story-reopen-btn"> <$set name="qualstate" value="$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver"> <$reveal type="match" state=<<qualstate>> text="bottom"> <<openMyTiddlers "[enlist{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}]">> </$reveal> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<qualstate>> text="bottom"> <<openMyTiddlers "[enlist{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##last-closed}reverse[]]">> </$reveal> </$set> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/left-arrow}} </$button> </$set> </$list> \end \define closeAllBtn() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible my-story-close-all-btn"> <$set name="myStory" filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings" $index="last-closed" $value=<<myStory>>/> </$set> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-all-tiddlers"/> <<lingo Button>> </$button> \end \define edit-btn() <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[show-edit-button]removeprefix[no]] ~[all[current]!has[draft.of]]"> <$list filter=[all[current]minlength[1]]> <span class="my-story-btn"> <$button message="tm-edit-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Caption}} class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} </$button> </span> </$list> </$list> \end \define clone-btn() <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[show-clone-button]removeprefix[no]] ~[all[current]!has[draft.of]]"> <$list filter=[all[current]minlength[1]]> <span class="my-story-btn"> <$button message="tm-new-tiddler" param=<<currentTiddler>> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}} class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} </$button> </span> </$list> </$list> \end \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/StoryList" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler<actionTiddler>]"/> \end <ul class="my-story te-nav-list"> <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" history="$:/HistoryList" storyview="pop"> <li><div style="position: relative;"> <$droppable actions=<<drop-actions>>> <div class="tc-droppable-placeholder">   </div> <div> <<my-close-btn>><<bookmark-icon>><<my-link>><<edit-btn>> <<clone-btn>> </div> </$droppable> </div> </li> </$list> </ul> <$tiddler tiddler=""> <$droppable actions=<<drop-actions>>> <div class="tc-droppable-placeholder">   </div> <footer class="my-story-footer"> <<closeAllBtn>> <<reopenBtn>> </footer> </$droppable> </$tiddler>
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/tab.caption: MyStory

$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/macros.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/macros.text: \define my-link-text() <$transclude field={{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings##default-label}}><$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>  \end \define my-link() <$link to=<> tooltip=<>><$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"><> \end \define bookmark-icon() <$list filter="[all[current]tag[MyMark]]">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon}} \end \define MyStoryBkmrkBtn() <$list filter="[all[current]!tag[MyMark]]"> <$checkbox tag="MyMark" class="te-btn-inactive">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon-off}} <$list filter="[all[current]tag[MyMark]]"> <$checkbox tag="MyMark" class="te-btn-active">{{$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/bookmarks/icon}} \end
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/macros.caption: MyStory Macros

<path d="M22 2v18H9A9 9 0 0 1 9 2h13z" fill="currentColor"/><path class="vertical-line" d="M9.6 6.2v9.6c0 .8.6 1.4 1.4 1.4.8 0 1.4-.6 1.4-1.4V6.2c0-.8-.6-1.4-1.4-1.4-.8 0-1.4.6-1.4 1.4z"/><path d="M15.8 9.6H6.2c-.8 0-1.4.6-1.4 1.4 0 .8.6 1.4 1.4 1.4h9.6c.8 0 1.4-.6 1.4-1.4 0-.8-.6-1.4-1.4-1.4z"/></svg>

$:/plugins/telmiger/support.text:
!! Support the Author ''Hi!'' Iâ€™m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. â€“ Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers whoâ€™s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''Thank you very much for your support!''
//Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch
$:/plugins/telmiger/support.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/support
$:/plugins/telmiger/support.creator: Thomas Elmiger

$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/InStoryContr.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/InStoryContr.text:
\define config-title() $:/config/InStoryControls/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$set name="setting" filter="[[$:/plugins/telmiger/MyStory/settings]getindex[in-story-controls]removeprefix[hide]]" value="hide" emptyValue="show"> <$reveal type="match" text="show" default=<>>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/InStoryControls]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"><$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
